On Disconnecting

Escaping the tech that surrounds us

Reading Time: 2.6285714285714286min minutes

The pedal inched closer to the floor as my eyes glazed over. I turned the knob up to 45, music drowning out the wind from the open windows. Hard curves, cliffs and walls of stoneâ€“the amazing landscape of the coast produced nothing but inspiration and awe. Route 1 gave me a much needed day of escape. But it re-enforced something that I was just beginning to discover: the technology in my life, from my iPhone to my painstakingly pieced-together media center, is far from a necessity.

About Manik Rathee

I'm a user experience engineer, user interface designer and frontend developer. Formerly a UX Engineer for President Barack Obama, I am now the Lead Designer for Fluence, a startup in beautiful San Francisco.
